Created page with "{{codepointer|r=Strife|Classic attack}} '''A_CrusaderSweepRight'''
(''no parameter'')
Indentical to [[A_CrusaderSweepLeft]], but moves the actor to the right instead ..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Classic attack}} '''A_CrusaderSweepRight'''
(''no parameter'')
Indentical to [[A_CrusaderSweepLeft]], but moves the actor to the right instead of the left. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Crusader}} and derived classes.
